info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 3 at 3:01PM CDT until April 23 at 8:31PM CDT by NWS Jackson MS
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas...Mississippi... Louisiana...
Mississippi River Near Arkansas City affecting Desha, Washington, Chicot and Bolivar Counties.
Mississippi River Near Greenville affecting Washington, Chicot, Issaquena and East Carroll Counties.
Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Wilkinson, Adams and Concordia Counties.
Mississippi River At Vicksburg affecting Claiborne, Jefferson, Tensas, Madison and Warren Counties.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Mississippi River near Greenville.
* WHEN...From Sunday, April 13 to Wednesday, April 23.
* IMPACTS...At 50.0 feet, Upper Lake Ferguson Road and Warfield Point Park are closed.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 25.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday, April 13 and to a crest of 50.5 feet Saturday, April 19. - Flood stage is 48.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.water.noaa.gov/wfo/jan
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 315 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY, APRIL 13 TO WEDNESDAY, APRIL 23

area.areaDesc: Chicot, AR; East Carroll, LA; Issaquena, MS; Washington, MS
